Symbol.Script_3D:
! ================================================================================ ! Hotspots ! ================================================================================
unID=1
! A size HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID, A,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0,0,unID, A,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,0,0,unID, A,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,B,0,unID, A,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,B,0,unID, A,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,B,0,unID, A,2 : unID=unID+1
! B size HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID, B,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,-1,0,unID, B,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,B,0,unID, B,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A,0,0,unID, B,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,-1,0,unID, B,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,B,0,unID, B,2 : unID=unID+1
ADD a/2,b/2,0
hotspot a/2, b/2, 0, unID, zzyzx, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot a/2, b/2, -1, unID, zzyzx, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot a/2, b/2, zzyzx, unID, zzyzx, 2: unID=unID+1
hotspot -a/2, b/2, 0, unID, zzyzx, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot -a/2, b/2, -1, unID, zzyzx, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot -a/2, b/2, zzyzx, unID, zzyzx, 2: unID=unID+1
del 1
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then end pen gs_cont_pen resol gs_resol if gs_shadow=0 then shadow off
! ================================================================================ ! Legs ! ================================================================================ material gs_leg_mat if iLegType = LEGTYPE_1 then k = 1 if iLegType = LEGTYPE_2 then k = 2 if iLegType = LEGTYPE_3 then k = 3 if iLegType = LEGTYPE_4 then k = 4 if iLegType = LEGTYPE_5 then k = 5 if iLegType = LEGTYPE_NONE then k = 0 gosub 10+k
! ================================================================================ ! Simple 3D representation ! ================================================================================ if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then material gs_seat_mat resol 10 add a/2, b/2, leg_h prism_ 4, th, a/2-wArmrest, -b/2, 15, a/2-wArmrest, b/2-bt, 15, -a/2+wArmrest, b/2-bt, 15, -a/2+wArmrest, -b/2, 15 prism_ 4, t, a/2-wArmrest, b/2, 15, 0, -bt, 115, -a+2*wArmrest, 0, 115, 0, bt, 115 addz th prism_ 4, th/2, a/2-wArmrest, -b/2, 15, a/2-wArmrest, b/2-bt, 15, -a/2+wArmrest, b/2-bt, 15, -a/2+wArmrest, -b/2, 15 addz th/2 prism_ 4, th/2, a/2-wArmrest, -b/2, 15, a/2-wArmrest, b/2-bt, 15, -a/2+wArmrest, b/2-bt, 15, -a/2+wArmrest, -b/2, 15 addz th/2 addx a/2-wArmrest-wSeat/2 for i=1 to seat_num prism_ 4, th, wSeat/2, -b/2, 15, wSeat/2, b/2-bt, 15, -wSeat/2, b/2-bt, 15, -wSeat/2, -b/2, 15 addx -wSeat next i del i-1 del 5
add a/2, b/2, leg_h rotx 90 addz -b/2 for i=1 to 2 prism_ 4, b, a/2-wArmrest, 0, 79, 0, hh-wArmrest/2, 179, wArmrest/2, -240, 2079, a/2-wArmrest/2, 0, 15 mulx -1 next i del i-1 addz bt for i=1 to 2 prism_ 7, b/4, a/2-wArmrest, 3*th, 79, 0, hh-wArmrest/2-3*th, 179, wArmrest/2, -60, 2079, wArmrest/2/2, 30, 2079, wArmrest/2, 120, 2079, a/2-wSeat-wArmrest, zzyzx-leg_h, 15, 0, -(zzyzx-leg_h-3*th), 179 mulx -1 next i del i-1 if seat_num=3 then prism_ 4, b/4, -wSeat/2, 3*th, 79, 0, (zzyzx-leg_h-3*th), 179, wSeat, 0, 179, 0, -(zzyzx-leg_h-3*th), 179 endif
del 4
else
resol gs_resol
! ================================================================================ ! Detailed 3D representation ! ================================================================================
material gs_seat_mat
add a/2, b/2, leg_h for j=1 to 2 rotx 90 !---------------------------------------------------armrests------------- for i=1 to 2 hprism_ gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, 4, b/2, 0, r, 1, a/2-wArmrest, 0, 14, 0, hh-wArmrest/2, 178, wArmrest/2, -240, 2014, a/2-wArmrest/2, 0, 14
gosub 4000 mulz -1 next i del i-1
addz -(b/2-bt-b/8) for i=1 to 2
!-----------------------------------------------backrest cushions------- hprism_ gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, 11, b/8, 0, rr*0.9, 1, a/2-wArmrest-1.1*rr, 3*th, 12, a/2-wArmrest-rr, 3*th, 12, rr, 90, 2078, 0, hh-wArmrest/2-3*th-rr, 178, wArmrest/2, -60, 2078, wArmrest/2/2, 30, 2078, wArmrest/2, 120, 2078, a/2-wSeat-wArmrest+1.1*rr, zzyzx-leg_h, 12, rr, 90, 2078, 0, -(zzyzx-leg_h-3*th-2*rr), 178, rr, 90, 2078
gosub 4000 mulz -1 next i del i-1 del 1 del 1 mulx -1 next j del j-1 del 1
!--------------------------------bottom panel(bottom thick cushion)------- add wArmrest, b/2-(b-bt)/2, leg_h
call "fa_cushion_CSo_WMCC" parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, cush_a = (a/2-wArmrest)*2, cush_b = b-bt, cush_h = th, r1 = 0.02, r2 = cushionRad, gs_resol = gs_resol, cush_mat = gs_seat_mat
del 1
!------------------------------------------------------thin cushions------- add wArmrest , b/2 - (b-bt)/2 , leg_h + th for i=1 to 2 call "fa_cushion_CSo_WMCC" parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, cush_a = (a/2-wArmrest)*2, cush_b = b-bt, cush_h = th/2, r1 = 0.02, r2 = cushionRad, gs_resol = gs_resol, cush_mat = gs_seat_mat
addz th/2 next i del i-1 del 1
!-------------------------------------------------------top cushions------ add a-wArmrest - wSeat,0,leg_h + th*2 gosub 2000
for i=1 to seat_num call "fa_cushion_CSo_WMCC" parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, cush_a = wSeat, cush_b = b-bt, cush_h = th, r1 = 0.02, r2 = cushionRad, gs_resol = gs_resol, cush_mat = gs_seat_mat addx -wSeat next i del i-1 del 1
!---------------------------------------------------------back panel------
add a/2, b/2, leg_h gosub 2000 prism_ 4, t, a/2-wArmrest, b/2, 15, 0, -bt, 115, -a+2*wArmrest, 0, 115, 0, bt, 115 del 1
add a/2, b/2, leg_h !----------------------------middle backrest cushion for third seat------- if seat_num=3 then rotx 90 addz -(b/2-bt-b/8) for i=1 to 2 hprism_ gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, gs_seat_mat, 9, b/8, 0, rr*0.9, 1, 0.95*wSeat/2-1.1*rr, 3*th, 12, 0.95*wSeat/2-rr, 3*th, 12, rr, 90, 2078, 0, (zzyzx-leg_h-3*th-2*rr), 178, rr, 90, 2078, -0.95*wSeat+2*rr, 0, 178, rr, 90, 2078, 0, -(zzyzx-leg_h-3*th-2*rr), 178, rr, 90, 2078 mulz -1 next i del i-1 del 2 gosub 2000 endif del 1
endif
! ================================================================================ END ! END ! END ! END ! END ! END ! END ! END ! END ! END ! END ! ================================================================================
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Subroutines for Legtypes ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10: leg_h=0 RETURN
11: _minusA = 0.32 _minusB = 0.08 ADD a/2- (a-_minusA)/2, b/2- (b-_minusB)/2, 0 CALL "fa_sofalegtyp_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS sofaleg_typ_m=1, a=a-_minusA, b=b-_minusB, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol,gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_leg_mat=gs_leg_mat DEL 1 RETURN
12: _minusA = 0.32 _minusB = 0.08 ADD a/2- (a-_minusA)/2, b/2- (b-_minusB)/2, 0 CALL "fa_sofalegtyp_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS sofaleg_typ_m=2, a=a-_minusA, b=b-_minusB, leg_h=leg_h, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol,gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_leg_mat=gs_leg_mat DEL 1 RETURN
13: _minusA = 0.32 _minusB = 0.08 ADD a/2- (a-_minusA)/2, b/2- (b-_minusB)/2, 0 CALL "fa_sofalegtyp_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS sofaleg_typ_m=3, a=a-_minusA, b=b-_minusB, leg_h=leg_h, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol,gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_leg_mat=gs_leg_mat DEL 1 RETURN
14: _minusA = 0.26 _minusB = 0.1 ADD a/2- (a-_minusA)/2, b/2- (b-_minusB)/2, 0 CALL "fa_sofalegtyp_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS sofaleg_typ_m=4, a=a-_minusA, b=b-_minusB, leg_h=leg_h, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol,gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_leg_mat=gs_leg_mat DEL 1 RETURN
15: _minusA = 0.4 _minusB = 0.12 ADD a/2- (a-_minusA)/2, b/2- (b-_minusB)/2, 0 CALL "fa_sofalegtyp_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS sofaleg_typ_m=5, a=a-_minusA, b=b-_minusB, leg_h=leg_h, ur=wArmrest/8, lr=wArmrest/12, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_leg_mat=gs_leg_mat DEL 1 RETURN
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Texture Subroutines ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2000: gosub 5000 return
4000: rotx 90 gosub 5000 del 1 return
5000:
vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1
return
Symbol.Script_2D:
DRAWINDEX 10 if MSFront > EPS or MSRear > EPS or MSSide > EPS then if op_sofa then call "fa_minimalspace_CSo_WMCC" parameters all MSType = 5, MSFront = bedLength + MSFront, unID = 3000, diff2 = wArmrest, diff3 = bedLength ELSE call "fa_minimalspace_CSo_WMCC" parameters all MSType = 4, unID = 3000 ENDIF endif
PEN gs_cont_pen
unID = 1
! ====================================================================== ! SCALE ! ====================================================================== call "2dDetailLevel_CSo_WMCC" parameters gs_detlevel_2D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m, returned_parameters det2D
! --- 2D SYMBOL --- DRAWINDEX 30
IF det2D = 1 THEN CALL "fa_SofaSymbol_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS ALL iSofaSymbolType = SOFASYMBOL_RECTSIMPLE, MSType = 0 !! 1/200 IF det2D = 2 THEN CALL "fa_SofaSymbol_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS ALL iSofaSymbolType = SOFASYMBOL_RECT3, MSType = 0 !! 1/100 IF det2D = 4 THEN CALL "fa_SofaSymbol_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS ALL MSType = 0 !! Symbolic
! --- 1/50 --- IF det2D = 3 THEN
! --- Hotspots ---
CALL "fa_SofaSymbol_CSo_WMCC" PARAMETERS ALL iSofaSymbolType = 0, MSType = 0
! --- Symbol ---
IF gs_2DSeat = 0 THEN mask=0 ELSE mask=1 ENDIF
FILL gs_fill_type
add2 wArmrest, 0 ! back poly2_b 4, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, b, 1, 0, -bt, 101, a-2*wArmrest, 0, 101, 0, bt, 101
! seats for i=1 to seat_num poly2_b 5, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, wSeat, 0, mask, wSeat, b-bt-b/4, 1, 0, b-bt-b/4, mask, 0, 0, -1 add2 wSeat, 0 next i
poly2_b 4, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, wArmrest, 0, 1, wArmrest, b, 1, 0, b, 1 del i-1 del 1
! left armrest poly2_b 4, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, wArmrest, 0, 1, wArmrest, b, 1, 0, b, 1
add2 a/2, b-bt for i=1 to 2 poly2_b 4, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-wArmrest-wSeat, 0, mask, 0, -b/4, 101, wSeat+wArmrest/2, 0, 101, 0, b/4, 101 mul2 -1, 1 next i del i-1 if seat_num=3 then poly2_b 4, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, wSeat/2, 0, mask, 0, -b/4, 101, -wSeat, 0, 100+mask, 0, b/4, 101 endif del 1
ENDIF
if op_sofa=1 then ! Sofa Bed
if det2D = 3 then ta=wArmrest else ta=0.15 endif
fill gs_fill_type
poly2_b 5, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a-ta, 0,0, a-ta, -bedLength,0, ta, -bedLength,0, ta, 0,1, a-ta, 0,-1
line_type gs_dashed
line2 a-ta, 0, a-ta, -bedLength line2 a-ta, -bedLength, ta, -bedLength line2 ta, -bedLength, ta, 0
hotspot2 a-ta, 0, unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 a-ta, -bedLength, unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 ta, -bedLength, unID : unID=unID+1 hotspot2 ta, 0, unID : unID=unID+1 endif
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iLegType LEGTYPE_NONE = 0 LEGTYPE_1 = 1 LEGTYPE_2 = 2 LEGTYPE_3 = 3 LEGTYPE_4 = 4 LEGTYPE_5 = 5
! const values for parameter: iSofaSymbolType SOFASYMBOL_RECTSIMPLE = 1 SOFASYMBOL_RECT1 = 2 SOFASYMBOL_RECT2 = 3 SOFASYMBOL_RECT3 = 4 SOFASYMBOL_RECT4 = 5 SOFASYMBOL_CURVEDSIMPLE = 6 SOFASYMBOL_CURVED = 7
!Sofa Bed EPS = 0.0001 wArmrest = 10" hh = zzyzx-leg_h-zzyzx/4 r = 1" !edge radius cushionRad = min (0.95 * r, gs_seat_height/20) rr = r*2.5 !edge radius(backrest cushions) th = (gs_seat_height-leg_h)/3 bt = B/20 t = hh+wArmrest/3*2 wSeat = (A-2*wArmrest)/seat_num ! width of seat (of cushions)
bedLength = bed_length - B
If seat_num=2 then parameters gs_SeatNum_m=2 If seat_num=3 then parameters gs_SeatNum_m=3
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_dialog `Sofa Settings`
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page ui_page gs_ui_current_page
dim tabTitles[2] tabTitles[1] = `Dimensions` tabTitles[2] = `Appearance`
dim tabIcons[2] tabIcons[1] = "ui_tab_furniture_dim(1)" tabIcons[2] = "ui_tab_furniture_appearance(1)"
FILE_DEPENDENCE "ui_tab_furniture_dim(1)" FILE_DEPENDENCE "ui_tab_furniture_appearance(1)"
CALL "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, nTabs = vardim1(tabTitles), gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page, tabTitles = tabTitles, tabIcons = tabIcons
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 1 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! UI_PAGE 1
dim stSofaPars[7] dim stSofaNames[7]
x1 = 12 ! 1st column x coordinate x2 = 100 ! 2nd column x coordinate x3 = 225 ! 3rd column x coordinate x4 = 350 ! 4th column x coordinate yCurrent = 40 ! row y coordinate
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Leg Style`, x1, yCurrent, 215-x1, 15 UI_STYLE 0,0
UI_INFIELD{3} "iLegType", x1, yCurrent+20, 180, 100, 2,"ui_sofalegtypes(13)",6,2, 170,100,80,90, 1,`Type 1`, LEGTYPE_1, 2,`Type 2`, LEGTYPE_2, 3,`Type 3`, LEGTYPE_3, 4,`Type 4`, LEGTYPE_4, 5,`Type 5`, LEGTYPE_5, 6,`None`, LEGTYPE_NONE
yCurrent = 170
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Surfaces`, x1, yCurrent, 215-x1, 15 UI_STYLE 0,0
yCurrent = yCurrent + 25
stSofaPars[1] = "gs_seat_mat" stSofaPars[2] = "gs_leg_mat"
stSofaNames[1] = `Seating` stSofaNames[2] = `Leg`
for iSofa = 1 to 2 UI_OUTFIELD stSofaNames[iSofa], x1, yCurrent, x2-x1-2, 15 UI_INFIELD stSofaPars[iSofa], x2, yCurrent-4, 192-x2, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 25 next iSofa
yCurrent = 40
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Sizes`, x3, yCurrent, 430-x3, 15 UI_STYLE 0,0
yCurrent = yCurrent + 30
stSofaPars[1] = "A" stSofaPars[2] = "B" stSofaPars[3] = "ZZYZX" stSofaPars[4] = "bed_length" stSofaPars[5] = "seat_num" stSofaPars[6] = "gs_seat_height" stSofaPars[7] = "leg_h"
stSofaNames[1] = `Sofa Width` stSofaNames[2] = `Sofa Depth` stSofaNames[3] = `Sofa Height` stSofaNames[4] = `Bed Length` stSofaNames[5] = `No. of Seats` stSofaNames[6] = `Seat Height` stSofaNames[7] = `Leg Height`
for iSofa = 1 to 7 if iSofa = 4 and not(op_sofa) then bedFlag = 4 else bedFlag = 0 endif UI_OUTFIELD stSofaNames[iSofa], x3, yCurrent, x4-x3-2, 15,bedFlag UI_INFIELD stSofaPars[iSofa], x4, yCurrent-4, 430-x4, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 25 next iSofa
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 2 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! UI_PAGE 2
UI_SEPARATOR 5, 170, 440, 170 UI_SEPARATOR 220, 175, 220, 260
IF gs_detlevel_2D_m = 3 THEN det2D = 3 IF gs_detlevel_2D_m = 2 THEN det2D = 2 IF gs_detlevel_2D_m = 1 THEN det2D = 1 IF gs_detlevel_2D_m = 4 THEN det2D = 4
IF gs_detlevel_2D_m = 0 THEN ! Scale sensitive det2D = 2
if GLOB_SCALE > 150 then det2D = 1 if GLOB_SCALE > 75 and GLOB_SCALE <= 150 then det2D = 2 if GLOB_SCALE <= 75 then det2D = 3
endif
x1 = 12 x2 = 118 x3 = 235 x4 = 350 x5 = 390 x6 = 66 !pic x coordinate yCurrent = 56
UI_OUTFIELD `Detail Level`, x1, yCurrent, x2-x1-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_detlevel_2D", x2, yCurrent-4, 215-x2, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 24
IF det2D = 1 THEN UI_PICT "ui_SofaSymbRectSimple(13)", x6, yCurrent, 69, 46,1 endif IF det2D = 2 THEN UI_PICT "ui_SofaSymbRect3(13)", x6, yCurrent, 69, 46,1 endif IF det2D = 3 THEN UI_PICT "ui_SofaSymbSofabed_50(13)", x6, yCurrent, 69, 46,1 endif
IF det2D = 4 THEN ui_infield{3} "iSofaSymbolType", x1+12, yCurrent-5, 170, 50, 2,"ui_SofaSymbol(13)",8,2, 150,60,57,41, 1,`Rectangle, Simple`, SOFASYMBOL_RECTSIMPLE, 2,`Rectangle 1`, SOFASYMBOL_RECT1, 3,`Rectangle 2`, SOFASYMBOL_RECT2, 4,`Rectangle 3`, SOFASYMBOL_RECT3, 5,`Rectangle 4`, SOFASYMBOL_RECT4, 6,`Curved, Simple`, SOFASYMBOL_CURVEDSIMPLE, 7,`Curved`, SOFASYMBOL_CURVED
ENDIF
UI_STYLE 0, 1 UI_OUTFIELD `2D Representation`, x1, 35, 215-x1, 15 UI_STYLE 0, 0
UI_INFIELD{3} "gs_2DSeat", x1, 130, 215-x1, 15, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Show Seats in 2D`, 0, 1, `Show Seats in 2D`, 1
UI_INFIELD{3} "op_sofa", x1, 150, 215-x1, 15, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Open Sofa Bed in 2D`, 0, 1, `Open Sofa Bed in 2D`, 1
yCurrent = 56
UI_OUTFIELD `Contour Pen`, x3, yCurrent , x5-x3-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_cont_pen", x5, yCurrent -4, 430-x5, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 27
UI_OUTFIELD `Fill Type`, x3, yCurrent , x4-x3-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_type", x4, yCurrent -4, 430-x4, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 27
UI_OUTFIELD `Fill Pen`, x3, yCurrent , x5-x3-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_pen", x5, yCurrent -4, 430-x5, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 27
UI_OUTFIELD `Background Pen`, x3, yCurrent , x5-x3-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_back_pen", x5, yCurrent -4, 430-x5, 22
yCurrent = 174
UI_STYLE 0, 1 UI_OUTFIELD `Minimal Space`, x3, yCurrent, 430-x3, 15 UI_OUTFIELD `3D Representation`, x1, yCurrent, 215-x1, 15 UI_STYLE 0, 0
yCurrent = yCurrent + 24
dim stMinNames[3] stMinNames[1] = `In Front` stMinNames[2] = `On Sides` stMinNames[3] = `Behind`
dim stMinPars[3] stMinPars[1] = "MSFront" stMinPars[2] = "MSSide" stMinPars[3] = "MSRear"
for iMin = 1 to 3 UI_OUTFIELD stMinNames[iMin], x3, yCurrent, x4-x3-2, 15 UI_INFIELD stMinPars[iMin], x4, yCurrent-4, 430-x4, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 24 next iMin
yCurrent = 198
UI_OUTFIELD `3D`, x1, yCurrent, x2-x1-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_detlevel_3D", x2, yCurrent-4, 215-x2, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 24
UI_OUTFIELD `Resolution`, x1, yCurrent, x2-x1-2, 15 UI_INFIELD "gs_resol", x2, yCurrent-4, 215-x2, 22 yCurrent = yCurrent + 24
UI_INFIELD{3} "gs_shadow", x1, yCurrent, 215-x1, 15, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Shadow`, 0, 1, `Shadow`, 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types_CSo_WMCC" parameters all
CALL "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, nTabs = 2, gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Detailed`,`Simple`,`Off` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0 VALUES "seat_num" 2,3 values{2} "iLegType" LEGTYPE_1, `Type 1`, LEGTYPE_2, `Type 2`, LEGTYPE_3, `Type 3`, LEGTYPE_4, `Type 4`, LEGTYPE_5, `Type 5`, LEGTYPE_NONE, `None` values{2} "iSofaSymbolType" SOFASYMBOL_RECTSIMPLE, `Rectangle, Simple`, SOFASYMBOL_RECT1, `Rectangle 1`, SOFASYMBOL_RECT2, `Rectangle 2`, SOFASYMBOL_RECT3, `Rectangle 3`, SOFASYMBOL_RECT4, `Rectangle 4`, SOFASYMBOL_CURVEDSIMPLE, `Curved, Simple`, SOFASYMBOL_CURVED, `Curved`
call "2dDetailLevel_CSo_WMCC" parameters gs_detlevel_2D = gs_detlevel_2D, gs_detlevel_2D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m, enable2dDetLevels = 2+4+8+16+32
if gs_detlevel_2D_m <> 4 then hideparameter "iSofaSymbolType"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m else gs_detlevel_3D = `Off` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` parameters gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D endif
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then HIDEPARAMETER "gs_resol" LOCK "gs_resol" ENDIF IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then HIDEPARAMETER "gs_resol", "gs_shadow" LOCK "gs_resol", "gs_shadow" ENDIF
IF iLegType = LEGTYPE_NONE then LOCK "leg_h", "gs_leg_mat" leg_h=0 HIDEPARAMETER "leg_h", "gs_leg_mat" ENDIF IF iLegType = LEGTYPE_1 THEN PARAMETERS leg_h=0'-3 5/32" LOCK "leg_h" HIDEPARAMETER "leg_h" leg_h=0'-3 5/32" ENDIF
IF seat_num=2 THEN values "A" range [1.2,) ENDIF
IF seat_num=3 THEN values "A" range [1.7,) ENDIF
values "B" range [0.6,)
values "zzyzx" range [0.7,1.5] values "leg_h" range [0,min(0.4,zzyzx*0.45-0.2))
values "gs_seat_height" range [leg_h+0.2,zzyzx*0.45]
values "bed_length" range (B, ) values "gs_resol" range [3,)
if not(op_sofa) then lock "bed_length" endif
IF gs_cont_pen<=0 then PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=4 IF gs_fill_pen<=0 then PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=19
! Minimal Space
if MSFront < 0 then MSFront = 0 parameters MSFront = MSFront endif if MSSide < 0 then MSSide = 0 parameters MSSide = MSSide endif if MSRear < 0 then MSRear = 0 parameters MSRear = MSRear endif
Symbol.Comment: Sofa bed with leg styles, 2D symbols and minimal space.

Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
gosub "fmtypes_bwm"
gosub "gs_SymbolType_bwm"
gosub "gs_leg_type_bwm"
! ============================================================================== ! Set Migration GUID ! ==============================================================================

! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "gs_SymbolType_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "gs_SymbolType", "String" newparameter "gs_SymbolType_m", "Integer"
gs_SymbolType = `Rectangle, Simple` gs_SymbolType_m = 1
if iSofaSymbolType = SOFASYMBOL_RECT3 then gs_SymbolType = `Rectangle 3` gs_SymbolType_m = 4 endif if iSofaSymbolType = SOFASYMBOL_RECT4 then gs_SymbolType = `Rectangle 4` gs_SymbolType_m = 5 endif if iSofaSymbolType = SOFASYMBOL_RECT1 then gs_SymbolType = `Rectangle 1` gs_SymbolType_m = 2 endif if iSofaSymbolType = SOFASYMBOL_RECT2 then gs_SymbolType = `Rectangle 2` gs_SymbolType_m = 3 endif if iSofaSymbolType = SOFASYMBOL_CURVEDSIMPLE then gs_SymbolType = `Curved, Simple` gs_SymbolType_m = 6 endif if iSofaSymbolType = SOFASYMBOL_CURVED then gs_SymbolType = `Curved` gs_SymbolType_m = 7 endif parameters gs_SymbolType = gs_SymbolType, gs_SymbolType_m = gs_SymbolType_m
endif return
! ============================================================================== ! Change string parameter to integer ! ============================================================================== "gs_leg_type_bwm": if targetGUID # "" then newparameter "gs_leg_type", "String" gs_leg_type = `None` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_1 then gs_leg_type = `Type 1` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_2 then gs_leg_type = `Type 2` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_3 then gs_leg_type = `Type 3` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_4 then gs_leg_type = `Type 4` if iLegType = LEGTYPE_5 then gs_leg_type = `Type 5` parameters gs_leg_type = gs_leg_type
